 Snow Removal Camp Petersville, NB
-------------------------------

**Request for Proposal Information:**

* **Request Number:** W6898-230603/A
* **Expiry Date:** September 15, 2022, at 13:00:00
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Maryse Cyr, Contracting Authority
	+ Email: <maryse.cyr@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca>
	+ Telephone: (506) 377-4894
	+ Fax: (506) 851-6759
* **Project Description:**
	+ This Request for Proposal seeks offers for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, and equipment required to carry out snow clearance and removal at Camp Petersville.
	+ The contract duration will be from October 15, 2022, to October 14, 2023, with an option to renew for two one-year periods.
	+ All work is to be performed in accordance with the specification number L-G2/11-9301/13.
* **Site Visit:**
	+ Interested potential offers are invited to visit the working site on August 26, 2022, at Camp Petersville, Base Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick.
	+ To attend the site visit, contractors should register with the Contracting Authority by August 25, 2022, at 12:00 pm.
* **Requirements:**
	+ The service requirements are as follows:
		- Carrying out snow clearance and removal at Camp Petersville in accordance with the specification number L-G2/11-9301/13.
		- The contract duration will be from October 15, 2022, to October 14, 2023, with an option to renew for two one-year periods.

**Additional Information:**

* **Trade Agreements:** This opportunity is open to businesses eligible under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
* **Language of Communication:**
	+ The language of communication for this Request for Proposal is English.
	+ All tender documentation must be submitted in English.
* **Documents Submission:**
	+ Tenderers are required to submit their tender in accordance with the instructions provided in the attachments.
